name: SmileDog
description:
SmileDog "Your Receptionist"​ provides businesses with full-time and backup offsite virtual reception services. Ensuring you never miss a call and new prospective clients always get a live person to talk to. With the ability to handle custom greetings and keep tabs on a variety of details about your business or office from who's on vacation to who's out sick today. Our SmileGals handle each of your calls with the right mix of professionalism and friendliness.
Your clients won't even know we don't work right in your office.
